titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promptly commence remedial action at the Paoli Railyard Superfund Site in Paoli, Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 7/28/1988--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to promptly commence remedial action at the Paoli Railyard Superfund Site in Paoli, Pennsylvania.
